valueString.value: Corona Science - Dumondas che sa repetan

text.value: Do you suspect having contracted with the coronavirus?

valueString.value: Hast du den Verdacht, am Coronavirus zu leiden?
Do you suspect having contracted the coronavirus?
Hesch du ds Gfüeu, am Coronavirus z'lide?

text.value: Have you been tested for the coronavirus?

valueString.value: Wurdest du auf das Coronavirus getestet?
Have you been tested for the coronavirus?
As-tu été testé-e pour le coronavirus?
Bisch du uf ds Coronavirus testet worde?
Hai effettuato un test per il coronavirus?
Has ti fatg in coronavirus test?
Quel est le résultat du test?
Qual è il risultato del test?
Co è il resultat dal test?

text.value: Have you contacted a doctor's office or an emergency room?

valueString.value: Hast du eine Arztpraxis oder eine Notfallaufnahme kontaktiert?
Have you contacted a doctor's office or an emergency room?
As-tu contacté un cabinet médical ou les urgences?
Hesch du en Arztpraxis oder e Notufnahm kontaktiert?
Hai contattato uno studio medico o un pronto soccorso?
Has ti contactà ina pratica da medi u ina recepziun da cas urgents?
Je me fais du soucis pour...
